Episodes.Title: New Car
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Annet Mahendru
Episodes.Plot: Philip and Elizabeth both find themselves faced with painful turns in their various missions. Stan fights to gain access to an American military program that could give him the upper hand in his battle of wills with Oleg.

Episodes.Title: Martial Eagle
Episodes.Writer: Joseph Weisberg, Tracey Scott Wilson, Oliver North
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Annet Mahendru
Episodes.Plot: Philip and Elizabeth's long-planned mission turns ugly, impacting each of them in different ways. Stan digs in deeper at work as his personal life continues to unravel.

Episodes.Title: Yousaf
Episodes.Writer: Joseph Weisberg, Stephen Schiff, Stuart Zicherman
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Annet Mahendru
Episodes.Plot: A new mission with international stakes has Philip calling on Annelise for assistance just as an old foe returns to D.C. with a vendetta. Stan makes a discovery that could put the FBI hot on the trail of illegals.

Episodes.Title: Stealth
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Annet Mahendru
Episodes.Plot: Elizabeth makes a shocking discovery about Kate. Philip pursues a contact for information about the new Stealth technology. Stan continues his pursuit of the illegals.

Episodes.Title: Operation Chronicle
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Annet Mahendru
Episodes.Plot: With Larrick closing in, Elizabeth rushes to exfiltrate Jared while Philip readies Fred for a crucial mission. Arkady finally plays his hand, forcing Stan to make an impossible choice.

Episodes.Title: Echo
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Annet Mahendru
Episodes.Plot: Nina finds that her future is in Stan's hands. Meanwhile, Paige and Henry are moved to safety as their parents attempt to complete their assignment.
